parameters.name: btcAddress
parameters.description: The Bitcoin address for which staking transactions are being requested.

parameters.name: pkHash
parameters.description: The public key hash associated with the given Bitcoin address.

parameters.name: coreAddress
parameters.description: The reward address of BTC staking.

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of transactions per page. Defaults to 100 if not provided.
